comment: I advise you to take note of the date of these reviews! Connelly seems nice enough but goes on this weird power trip with students. Grades harshly. Syllabus and due dates don't match and discussion due dates change week by week. Her tests don't have study guides and are so specific. You'll teach yourself the software and flounder through the rest.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Tough grader

comment: Firstly, if you aren't creative / if you don't care about being creative, Connelly's digital publication design class might be really tough for you. She is hilarious and super likable, but she makes you work for your grade. If you aren't great at creative projects, she gives really helpful feedback to improve your weaknesses. TAKE HER!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: I loved Prof Connelly!! I am not creative at all, but enjoyed designing stuff in this class! I left with designs I was actually proud of. The stuff she shows in class is actually interesting too. Can't skip class though, you'll miss valuable information to use on your projects.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Connelly is the absolute best. If you are interested in learning design no matter what skill level you have, do yourself a service and take her. She is very caring & understanding of her students and gives the most detailed feedback I've ever seen to let you know what could be improved upon. I started with horrible designs and left proud.

She gives A LOT of work. Lots of discussions and assignments. VERY HARD GRADER. Be prepared for a lot of critisism on your work. She assigns group projects for an online class. which was VERY hard because my group members lived out of the state and couldn't meet up with me & never responded to me. Wouldn't recommend.

An intense maymester class, but worth it. You will learn a lot about color, design, & the do's and don't of design. Initially thought that I wouldn't gain much from this class. I was wrong. Mrs. Connelly knows a lot and explains it in simple terms. Take this class, if you have the option. You will not regret it.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: Ms. Connelly was the best professor I've had in four years of college. She's very knowledgeable in the subject and does a great job at explaining design and how to use the programs. You can come into this class with no prior design experience and do great. There is definitely time-consuming work, but it's enjoyable and worth it.

Don't buy book. Few quizzes--fairly easy. Great professor! She really cares that you're understanding her instructions for the assignments. I knew absolutely nothing about design, but she reassured us all and taught us a bunch of useful skills! You'll really enjoy this class! ASK questions and watch the videos. Very useful! No finals.

Prof Connelly is an awesome professor. I knew nothing about design going into her class, but she was very patient with us. The class is a little tough because of the software, but she helps you through it. I would highly recommend her! She gives extra credit assignments at the end that help a lot. Attendance wasn't mandatory, but it helps to attend

Professor Connelly is awesome! Her class isn't too hard but not a throw away course. If you come to class and ask questions then you'll do fine. She really cares about her students and pushes you to do your best.
